name: Inworld Origins
summary: Origins is a playable short created by the team at Inworld AI to showcase NPCs powered by artificial intelligence. After an explosion in Metropolis, you’ve arrived on the scene as the lead detective. Question witnesses, uncover the mystery, and solve the case. From the creator of The Matrix Awakens.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Unscripted AI NPCs in Detective RPG - Inworld Origins Trailer
